name: Memories • Classic
description:
"Memories" is a fun and addictive game of memory skills. Designed for the entire family it is suitable for people of all ages from kids to grandparents. It is the follow-up to the enormously successful previous game "Memory*" which has been downloaded over 2.1 million times!

This game contains:

• 750 Exclusive Images
• 240 Levels (from 4 to 100 cards)
• 8 Card Sets (Animals, Food, Music, Objects, People, Sports, Letters, Numbers)
• An excellement educative mode with text and loud voices in 3 languges (English, French, Spanish)
• A great two player mode for family challenges


The game is composed of 4 game modes and more than 750 levels, where images are shuffled and placed face down on the screen. Players have to discover two identical pictures, letters or numbers and remove them from the game. Once one pair is found and removed, players move onto the next one and so on. The faster they remove all the pairs and clear the level, the higher the score. You can compare yourself to friends or other players on Apple Game Center.

A Two-Player modes is available, and a great Educative mode let you chose the cards images you want to play with, to display or not text below images and to read loud the text with speech synthesis. Moreover, you can learn Spanish or French by chosing different languages for first and second card. A really valuable experience!


••• Train your memory with this simple game and have fun ! •••
